appDescription.message: Randomly divide items into balanced groups

itemsPlaceholder.message:
Enter items here...
Example:
Alice
Bob
Charlie
Diana

placeholder.message: Enter items and click "Randomize Groups" to see the results

errorNoItems.message: Please enter at least one item

errorMinGroups.message: Number of groups must be at least 2

errorTooManyGroups.message: Number of groups cannot exceed number of items

duplicateNote.message: Please remove duplicates before creating groups.
